channel.title: astrophysics on Alex Gagliano
channel.description: Recent content in astrophysics on Alex Gagliano

item.title: Globular Clusters in Coma
item.description: The large scale distribution of globular clusters in the central region of the Coma cluster of galaxies is derived through the analysis of Hubble Space Telescope/Advanced Camera for Surveys data.

item.title: Sounds of the Spectrum
item.description: For thousands of years, we have used our eyes to study the cosmos, but what if we could use our ears, or our hands? What would we learn if we gave everyone a chance to experience our universe?
